infobox.Japanese title:: 探偵は眠らない  (Tantei wa Nemuranai)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba
infobox.Animation director:: Seiji Muta (supervisor)  Yusuke Shimizu  Eiichi Tokura
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Masanori Hashimoto (sub-character)  Hiroshi Ogawa (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Risa Hayamizu as Ryuko Kusakabe  Masaaki Ihara as Police detective  Tomohiko Nakashima as Police detective  Shinobu Adachi as Kino Kinoshita  Yusuke Numata as Hisashi Tsukumo  Rika Morinaga as Kae Nishiwaki

sections.Situation:
A young office worker named Kae Nishiwaki asked Kogoro to investigate someone who sneaks into her apartment when she goes to work. She tells him that this has happened three times and that they leave gifts each time they sneak in. Kogoro visits her apartment, with Conan tagging along, and she finds that someone has placed a suitcase in her room. Kogoro opens it to see the dead body of Ryuko Kusakabe, Kae's boss, and all of them are shocked.

The police are called, and they realize that the victim died at 1 am when she was struck on her head with a blunt object. Kae informs them that the culprit snuck into her apartment on Thursdays. The forensic officer then finds a listening device in her room. While questioning the residents of the building, and old lady called Kino Kinoshita tells the police that a resident called Hisashi Tsukumo had once returned Kae's key after she lost it. While asking Tsukumo, the police find that he has his Thursdays off. But Tsukumo informs them that he has an alibi for the previous night.
Megure then receive a call informing him that the crime occurred at a park in Hidora. The weapon and a lighter with Tsukumo's fingerprints are found near the crime scene. Tsukumo once told Kinoshita that seeing Kae reminded him of his sister. She tells this to Kogoro and Conan.

sections.Trivia:
- During the TV broadcast of the episode, there is a running text reporting about the death of Kiyoyuki Yanada, who voiced Andre Camel. He passed away on November 14, 2022.
- The title of this episode pays homage to the mystery novel written by Michio Tsuzuki, which has the exact same name, "探偵は眠らない".
- Anime-original location: Sadora Town (悲虎町).
